alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Tensas, northeastern Concordia, northern Catahoula and Franklin Parishes, southwestern Claiborne, Jefferson, northwestern Franklin and northeastern Adams Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Jigger to near Mccall Creek. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Hope around 725 PM CDT. Liddieville around 745 PM CDT. Winnsboro, Pleasant Hill and Union Church around 800 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
